events.name: Kansas City Chiefs at Cleveland Browns

headlines.description: — The only thing the Chiefs had to worry about in the final minutes Sunday was Patrick Mahomes' ankle.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mahomes throws 2 TD passes, leaves with ankle injury in Chiefs' 21-7 win. X-rays negative on star QB

headlines.description: — Joe Burrow knows the Cincinnati Bengals' playoff hopes are slender at best at the bottom of the AFC's bubble teams.
headlines.shortLinkText: Joe Burrow sets franchise record with 3 more TD passes as Bengals beat Titans 37-27

events.name: Washington Commanders at New Orleans Saints

headlines.description: — Jayden Daniels' second game in the Superdome again came down to a play after a touchdown with no time left.
headlines.shortLinkText: Daniels passes for 2 TDs and Commanders outlast Saints 20-19 on New Orleans' failed 2-point try

events.name: Baltimore Ravens at New York Giants

headlines.description: — Lamar Jackson was miffed after losing a fumble at the Giants 12-yard line on the second play from scrimmage, and the Baltimore Ravens' superstar quarterback took it out on New York the rest of the day.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jackson throws 5 TD passes and Ravens send Giants to franchise record-tying 9th straight loss, 35-14

headlines.description: — CeeDee Lamb heard about oddsmakers listing the Carolina Panthers as a favorite for the first time in nearly two full years entering Sunday's game against the Dallas Cowboys.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rush throws for career-high 3 TDs, Cowboys force 4 turnovers to beat Panthers 30-14

events.name: New York Jets at Jacksonville Jaguars

headlines.description: — Davante Adams and Aaron Rodgers gave the New York Jets' next general manager and head coach something to ponder with a glimpse into the past — and potentially the future.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vintage performances by Davante Adams and Aaron Rodgers carry Jets past defenseless Jaguars 32-25

headlines.description: — Tasked with shadowing Miami's star receiver Tyreek Hill for most of Sunday's game, Houston cornerback Derek Stingley shined.
headlines.shortLinkText: Collins has 2 TD catches, Texans force 4 turnovers in 20-12 win over Dolphins

headlines.description: — Nik Bonitto's defensive touchdown was jaw-dropping. Jonathan Taylor's botched touchdown run was head-scratching.
headlines.shortLinkText: Broncos roar back on the strength of 5 takeaways to beat Colts 31-13 and close in on playoff berth

headlines.description: — Josh Allen took a shotgun snap, moved up in the pocket and backed up, rolled left and threw right.
headlines.shortLinkText: Josh Allen has another huge game to lift Bills to a 48-42 victory that snaps Lions' winning streak

headlines.description: — Jalen Hurts absorbed the shots when the Eagles' recent anemic passing attack was panned by his own star wide receivers. Hurts and A.J. Brown — one of those receivers who brought the complaints to a boil — then had their relationship dissected and...
headlines.shortLinkText: Jalen Hurts accounts for 3 TDs and Eagles beat Steelers 27-13 for franchise-best 10th straight win

events.name: New England Patriots at Arizona Cardinals

headlines.description: — Just five plays into Sunday's game, the Arizona Cardinals had lost two starting linebackers to injury.
headlines.shortLinkText: James Conner runs for 2 TDs and Cardinals snap a 3-game skid by beating Patriots 30-17

events.name: Tampa Bay Buccaneers at Los Angeles Chargers

headlines.description: — Two years ago, Baker Mayfield was trying to salvage his career in Southern California.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mayfield throws for 4 TD passes as Buccaneers dominate the second half to rout Chargers 40-17

events.name: Green Bay Packers at Seattle Seahawks

headlines.description: — Romeo Doubs improbably pulled in his second touchdown catch of the night from Jordan Love, sealing a decisive victory for the Packers and moving them closer to the postseason.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jordan Love throws for 2 TDs and Packers beat Seahawks 30-13 as Seattle QB Geno Smith injures knee
